TEXT.S:
= Lalumaang = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Sincungsyang ka alang Lalumaang. 204 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 542 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 39% niqan 214 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 61% niqan 328 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 26%, Bunun 1%, Tayal 1%, Truku 7%, Kebalan 2%, Paiwan 1%, ni rahuq na o 2%.
Hangan alang alang Tung-fung Row-ma.
Pnseanak alang Yasa mniq Sin-ceng-syang Tung-fang Row-ma- se-cyu, kika thangan na.
Nniqan Hwa-ren-seyn Sin-ceng-syang Pey-pu-cun.
Llbangan Sin-ceng-syang Su-ring-cey 233 syang.
Nniqan llingay breenux.
Pgkla ppanan rulu Mlutuc teyn-c ti-tu Klgan seejiq alang Amis.
Skari kari kari Amis, kari Tlu.
Snhiyan cung-cyaw Pnyahan alang Sin-ceng-syang ga kghak daya Nan-s klgan Amis hiya, ga mniq pusu daya dxgal ka Amia seejiq sbiyaw uri, egu bi spriq lmiqu ka hiya, tgdha ppais do, qqpahun bbrigan Ta-ri-s malu bi, hbaraw isil seejiq Amis meiyah mniq hini, dhuq ka sjiqan do, phyugan bgurah alang, mlutuc thangan nniqan ka alang ksun.
Pgkla rgrigaw kwan-kwang Qtaan bnatas Syu-sow Haw-ren-seyn-c 71 hngkawas bitaq 90 hngkawas. Pnatas Qang-pey-te. Haw-ren-seyn- cen-fu. Hngkawas 2005. Klabuy 58~61. Edaan alang seejiq tnpusu Tay-wan. Pusu pnatas Ring-syo-ce. Yueyn-cu-min-cu wey-yueyn-hwey. 2018. Klabuy 427.
